items.name: command-k
items.title: Command K (Quorum)
items.description: Global command palette with fuzzy search, keyboard navigation, and AI-powered suggestions for Quorum kernel operations

items.name: six-w1h-manifest
items.title: 6W1H Manifest (Quorum)
items.description: Displays immutable 6W1H contextual information (Who, What, When, Where, Why, Which, How) per Nexus Doctrine

items.name: exception-hunter
items.title: Exception Hunter (Quorum)
items.description: AI-powered exception detection and analysis with severity classification, suggested actions, and trend visualization

items.name: drilldown-dashboard
items.title: Drilldown Dashboard (Quorum)
items.description: Interactive KPI dashboard with hierarchical drill-down navigation, sparklines, and dimension-based filtering

items.name: trend-analysis-widget
items.title: Trend Analysis Widget (Quorum)
items.description: Multi-period trend comparison with anomaly highlighting, AI-generated insights, and configurable metrics

items.name: summit-button
items.title: SUMMIT Button (Cobalt)
items.description: Multi-step workflow button implementing S.U.M.M.I.T. protocol (Save, Upload, Message, Migrate, Integrate, Terminate)

items.name: predictive-form
items.title: Predictive Form (Cobalt)
items.description: AI-powered form with field prediction, auto-completion, validation, and context-aware suggestions

items.name: crud-sap-interface
items.title: CRUD-SAP Interface (Cobalt)
items.description: Unified CRUD operations interface with global search, inline editing, AI-predicted actions, and pagination

items.name: autofill-engine
items.title: Autofill Engine (Cobalt)
items.description: Context-aware field population with AI suggestions, confidence indicators, and one-click autofill

items.name: danger-zone-indicator
items.title: Danger Zone Indicator (Audit)
items.description: Policy violation warning system with severity levels, violation details, and override workflow

items.name: audit-trail-viewer
items.title: Audit Trail Viewer (Audit)
items.description: Comprehensive audit log viewer with filtering, diff comparison, export, and tamper-proof verification

items.name: risk-score-display
items.title: Risk Score Display (Audit)
items.description: Real-time risk assessment with gauge visualization, contributing factors breakdown, and recommendations

items.name: policy-override-record
items.title: Policy Override Record (Audit)
items.description: Documents policy overrides with justification, evidence attachment, approvals, and immutable record creation

items.name: ar-aging-table
items.title: AR Aging Table (ERP)
items.description: Accounts Receivable aging analysis with bucket breakdown, customer details, and collection status

items.name: ap-aging-table
items.title: AP Aging Table (ERP)
items.description: Accounts Payable aging analysis with vendor details, payment scheduling, and cash flow projection

items.name: inventory-valuation-card
items.title: Inventory Valuation Card (ERP)
items.description: Stock valuation display with costing method, stock level indicators, and reorder alerts

items.name: trial-balance-table
items.title: Trial Balance Table (ERP)
items.description: GL trial balance with debit/credit columns, balance verification, period comparison, and drill-through

items.name: reconciliation-widget
items.title: Reconciliation Widget (ERP)
items.description: Subledger to GL reconciliation with difference highlighting, auto-match suggestions, and adjustment posting

items.name: approval-queue
items.title: Approval Queue (AFANDA)
items.description: Hierarchical approval workflow with SLA timers, bulk actions, comments, and delegation support

items.name: sharing-board
items.title: Sharing Board (AFANDA)
items.description: Collaborative sharing board with permissions, comments, version tracking, and real-time presence

items.name: escalation-ladder
items.title: Escalation Ladder (AFANDA)
items.description: Automatic escalation paths with SLA timers, contact methods, and manual escalation triggers

items.name: consultation-thread
items.title: Consultation Thread (AFANDA)
items.description: Structured discussion threads with voting, mentions, canonical outcome recording, and expert tagging

items.name: read-receipt-system
items.title: Read Receipt System (AFANDA)
items.description: Document view tracking with acknowledgment requirements, reminders, and accountability reporting
